# Save Final Data  {.appendix}  

saved data after analysis to `dataAfterAnalysis.xlsx`.

```{r save final data}
saveRDS(mydata, "data/dataAfterAnalysis.rds")

writexl::write_xlsx(mydata, "data/dataAfterAnalysis.xlsx")

paste0(rownames(file.info("data/dataAfterAnalysis.xlsx")), " : ", file.info("data/dataAfterAnalysis.xlsx")$ctime)

```



\pagebreak
